alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 2:50PM CDT until April 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH 6 PM... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WINDS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 434, 435, AND 436... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 434 through 436. * WIND...West to southwest winds 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 35 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 10 to 15 percent this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest
